attributes.action: make MPs stand down if they don't honour the brexit vote of 2016
attributes.background:
MPs are voted into parliament by the people, if they can't honour the people's vote to leave the eu then they are failing to do their job that has been asked of them

Any MPs who dont agree with the people's vote of 2016 should stand down

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
